room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: My boyfriend and I escaped from the haunted mansion room. We had lots of fun during our visit and James was very helpful will small hints without giving us too much information when we were stuck. We’re definitely going back to try other rooms soon!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: Great time playing the mystery mansion ran by our game master, it was our first time and we will be back

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: Six of us went, first time for 4 of us. Ask for game master Kai!! We asked for the Mansion room. He helped guide us and gave us hints when asked. He was super friendly. We’ll definitely do this again!!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: Had an amazing time this afternoon doing the mystery mansion room! Really challenged us to use our brains while having fun. My 6 y.o. daughter had a great time as well. Our game master avocado was the real MVP!! Highly recommend!
